mapper.select: select distinct image_table.image_id,image_remark,image_name,image_system,image_introduce ,image_label.recommended_id,recommended_cpu,recommended_memory ,recommended_data_disk,image_table.user_id from image_table,recommended_table,image_label where image_table.image_id = image_label.image_id and image_label.recommended_id = recommended_table.recommended_id and image_table.source=0 and recommended_table.recommended_id = #{recommendedId}
select image_name from image_table where image_system=#{imageSystem} limit 1
select now() date_time,sum(image_use_count) image_use_count, user_id from image_table group by user_id
select pod_port from pod_controller_table order by create_time limit 1
